attributes.action: Honour killings, There should be a specific department within the police force soley focusing on honour killings.
attributes.additional_details:
An honor killing, or honour killing is the homicide of a member of a family or social group by other members, due to the belief of the perpetrators that the victim has brought dishonor or shame upon the family or community. It is a traditional practice that occurs in various cultures.

We need a specific department within the police force to deal with this issue it is more common than you realise,There are 3,000 honour killings committed in the uk alone every year!

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
